default.content:
UI menu.c32
DEFAULT install
MENU TITLE Boot options for default
MENU AUTOBOOT Starting boot from hd0 with bzImage in # seconds
TIMEOUT 50
TOTALTIMEOUT 600
PROMPT 0

LABEL boot_hd0
	MENU LABEL Boot from hd0
	COM32 chain.c32
	APPEND hd0

LABEL boot_hd0_bzi
	MENU LABEL Boot from hd0 with bzImage
	KERNEL images/default.bzImage
	APPEND root=/dev/sda1 rw console=ttyS1,115200 net.ifnames=0 biosdevname=0

LABEL install
	MENU LABEL install
	KERNEL cilla/vmlinuz
	APPEND initrd=cilla/initrd.img boot=live username=user union=overlay config components noswap edd=on nomodeset nodmraid locales=en_US.UTF-8  keyboard-layouts="US" net.ifnames=0 nosplash noprompt fetch=http://ch-bty01/tftpboot/cilla/filesystem.squashfs ocs_repository="nfs://ch-bty01/srv/images" ocs_prerun="wget http://ch-bty01/bty/bootstrap.sh -O bootstrap.sh" ocs_prerun1="sleep 2" ocs_live_run="sudo bash bootstrap.sh; sudo reboot" ocs_live_extra_param="" ocs_live_batch=yes

pxe-c115200.cfg.content:
UI menu.c32
DEFAULT {{ machine.plabel }}
MENU TITLE Boot options for {{ machine.hostname }}
MENU AUTOBOOT Starting boot from hd0 with bzImage in # seconds
TIMEOUT 50
TOTALTIMEOUT 600
PROMPT 0

LABEL boot_hd0
	MENU LABEL Boot from hd0
	COM32 chain.c32
	APPEND hd0

LABEL boot_hd0_bzi
	MENU LABEL Boot from hd0 with bzImage
	KERNEL images/{{ machine.hostname }}.bzImage
	APPEND root=/dev/sda1 rw console=ttyS1,115200 net.ifnames=0 biosdevname=0

LABEL install
	MENU LABEL install
	KERNEL cilla/vmlinuz
	APPEND initrd=cilla/initrd.img boot=live username=user union=overlay config components noswap edd=on nomodeset nodmraid locales=en_US.UTF-8  keyboard-layouts="US" net.ifnames=0 nosplash noprompt fetch=http://ch-bty01/tftpboot/cilla/filesystem.squashfs ocs_repository="nfs://ch-bty01/srv/images" ocs_prerun="wget http://ch-bty01/bty/bootstrap.sh -O bootstrap.sh" ocs_prerun1="sleep 2" ocs_live_run="sudo bash bootstrap.sh; sudo reboot" ocs_live_extra_param="" ocs_live_batch=yes

pxe-skip.cfg.content:
UI menu.c32
DEFAULT boot_hd0
MENU TITLE Boot options for unmanaged machine
MENU AUTOBOOT Starting boot from hd0 in # seconds
TIMEOUT 50
TOTALTIMEOUT 600
PROMPT 0

LABEL boot_hd0
	MENU LABEL Boot from hd0
	COM32 chain.c32
	APPEND hd0
